name: Puzzle Climber
description:
Quick, climb! You have a small amount of time to clear rows in the tetrimino game, or you'll be swallowed by lava!

Every row you clear lets you climb up the wall, but if your board fills up, the lava gets faster! Get hit by the lava 3 times and it's game over!

Made by a team in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace game jam!

Also on the team: Giaccotto and DerSchnoob

CONTROLS:

A or left arrow: Move tetris piece left

D or left arrow: Move tetris piece left

R or space: Rotate tetris piece clockwise

S or down arrow: Speed up tetris piece (you have to keep holding it!)
